name: Xenopomp
description:
Firmly positioned within the puzzle genre, this game promises to provide a challenging game-play with touches of action and adventure.

You play an Alien that has been imprisoned within an extra-dimensional labyrinth.

Your goal is simple: navigate an ever expanding dimension of paths, obstacles, traps, in an unrelenting desire to escape.

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD Keys Move the Player

ARROW Keys Move the Camera

Holding L-Alt & Moving the Mouse Moves the Camera

E Activates Terminals

ESC Pauses

Enter closes pop up messages

Get into the Exit portal before time runs out!

DEMO NOTES:

Only 3 levels are "ready" for play. These levels are VERY easy on problem solving, but can be otherwise complicated from the start. After mechanics are introduced, more and more complicated solutions will be required to advance. 

The UI system still needs a lot of work. One key issue is the map blocking UI elements due to an outdated setup where I based the UI on camera instead of the overlay.

A new 3D player model is in the works, and will be integrated into a later build.

Please direct all feedback to the discord, twitter, and anywhere else you think I'll see it. 

Thank you for playing! You can support my work using Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/pyramordial; join us on discord using https://discord.gg/fcRaTmy; and can follow more frequent updates on development with the twitter account here: https://twitter.com/Pyramordial
